description: Little Jinx is a short, slender 5'3" eccentric inventor and criminal with bright blue hair in two long braids, pale skin, and a leather bralette and short shorts.  She has a volatile personality, diagnosed with Borderline and Antisocial Personality Disorders, and a penchant for mayhem and destruction.  Her actions are driven by a deep-seated resentment and a disregard for others' feelings.
